report.title: My Sites
report.description: A list of sites I've created, or has to my list of sites (a custom person attribute).
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms lt ON lt.id=l.location_type_id LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN users u ON (u.id=#the_user_id#) LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values pav ON pav.person_id=u.person_id AND pav.person_attribute_id=#person_site_attr_id# AND pav.int_value=l.id AND pav.deleted=false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav ON lav.location_id=l.id AND lav.location_attribute_id=#private_location_attr_id# LEFT JOIN location_attributes la ON la.id=lav.location_attribute_id #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND #website_filter# AND (l.location_type_id=#shorewatch_location_type_id# or #shorewatch_location_type_id#='-1') AND (l.name not like '!%' OR #hide_previous_sites#<>1) AND (l.created_by_id=#the_user_id# OR ((((la.id=#private_location_attr_id# AND lav.int_value=0) OR (pav.int_value=l.id) OR (lav.id is null) ) AND #hide_all_other_users_private_sites# = '1') OR ('#hide_all_other_users_private_sites#' = '-1') ) )

param.name: shorewatch_location_type_id
param.description: ID of the Shorewatch location type in the database.

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include

param.name: the_user_id
param.description: Name of user to return sites for.

param.name: person_site_attr_id
param.description: The person attribute ID used to store My Sites

param.name: private_location_attr_id
param.description: The location attribute ID used to store whether a site is private

param.name: hide_all_other_users_private_sites
param.display: Hide all other users private sites
param.description: Hide all private sites in the sites list that are not 'my sites' for the supplied user.

param.name: hide_previous_sites
param.display: Hide sites that are no longer used
param.description: Hide all sites where the site name starts with !, denoting a site that is no longer in use.

column.name: created_by_user
column.sql: CASE l.created_by_id WHEN #the_user_id# THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: linked_to_user
column.sql: CASE WHEN u.person_id = pav.person_id THEN true ELSE false END
